column4: Hi, everytime I play a movie in gxine it closes when I play it in full screen :(
From what I understand totom-xine and gxine is just a matter of skins.
what format are you trying to play?
As I understand avi is just a container. It works when playing in non full screen?
I don't know I haven't uncountred this problem myself. Maybe switching to full screen switches to another video mode that your driver/card has problems with.
mine can but I needed libcss (or something called like that(
can be done from apt-get synaptic but you will need the correct reps
ahh ok what do you have??
you will need this: deb ftp://ftp.nerim.net/debian-marillat/ unstable main
add that line I mentioned then do a reload and then search for libdvdcss
